content.content:
1. For the purposes of subsection 30 (3) of the Act, the amount of an administrative penalty that the Director may impose in an order in respect of a contravention of a provision set out in Column 1 of Table 1 is, (a)  $200, if the ticket business that has contravened or is contravening the provision is not a corporation; or (b)  $3,000, if the ticket business that has contravened or is contravening the provision is a corporation. O. Reg. 604/20, s. 1. Table 1 Item   Column1   Provision contravened 

  1.   Paragraph 1 of subsection 5 (1) of the Act 

  2.   Paragraph 2 of subsection 5 (1) of the Act 

  3.   Clause 6 (1) (a) of the Act 

  4.   Clause 6 (1) (b) of the Act 

  5.   Clause 6 (2) (a) of the Act 

  6.   Clause 6 (2) (b) of the Act 

  7.   Clause 6 (3) (a) of the Act 

  8.   Clause 6 (3) (b) of the Act 

  9.   Subsection 7 (2) of the Act 

  10.   Subsection 7 (3) of the Act O. Reg. 604/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of subsection 30 (3) of the Act, the amount of an administrative penalty that the Director may impose in an order in respect of a contravention of a provision set out in Column 1 of Table 1 is,

(a)  $200, if the ticket business that has contravened or is contravening the provision is not a corporation; or

(b)  $3,000, if the ticket business that has contravened or is contravening the provision is a corporation. O. Reg. 604/20, s. 1.

content.section: Effect of multiple or subsequent contraventions on order
content.content: 2. (1) If the Director is satisfied that a ticket business has contravened or is contravening the same one provision listed in any of the items of Column 1 of Table 1 at any one or more times before issuing an order imposing an administrative penalty in respect of the contraventions, the order shall treat the contraventions as a single contravention. O. Reg. 318/18, s. 2 (1); O. Reg. 604/20, s. 2. (2) If the Director issues an order imposing an administrative penalty in respect of the contravention by a ticket business of a provision listed in any of the items of Column 1 of Table 1 and if the Director is satisfied that business is subsequently in contravention of the same provision, the Director shall not issue an order imposing an administrative penalty in respect of the subsequent contravention until at least seven days have passed since the day that the first order has been served on the business. O. Reg. 318/18, s. 2 (2); O. Reg. 604/20, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. (1) If the Director is satisfied that a ticket business has contravened or is contravening the same one provision listed in any of the items of Column 1 of Table 1 at any one or more times before issuing an order imposing an administrative penalty in respect of the contraventions, the order shall treat the contraventions as a single contravention. O. Reg. 318/18, s. 2 (1); O. Reg. 604/20, s. 2.

(2) If the Director issues an order imposing an administrative penalty in respect of the contravention by a ticket business of a provision listed in any of the items of Column 1 of Table 1 and if the Director is satisfied that business is subsequently in contravention of the same provision, the Director shall not issue an order imposing an administrative penalty in respect of the subsequent contravention until at least seven days have passed since the day that the first order has been served on the business. O. Reg. 318/18, s. 2 (2); O. Reg. 604/20, s. 2.

content.content: 3. An order imposing an administrative penalty against a ticket business shall specify that the business is required to pay the penalty within 30 days of being served with the order imposing the penalty.
content.raw_html: 3. An order imposing an administrative penalty against a ticket business shall specify that the business is required to pay the penalty within 30 days of being served with the order imposing the penalty.

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
